name: "Todo" App using PARSE as backend
body:
# Overview:
Show the usage of the **PARSE** sdk to store data in the cloud, in a nonsql database.
Based on the tutorial Todo List in parse web site. Using custom users, whom can create ad-hoc user to login.
The app can work offline and online, data will be sync with the cloud when online.


## References:

   Parse web site: https://parse.com/

   Parse Todo tutorial: https://parse.com/tutorials/using-the-local-datastore

   Parse Android sdk guide: https://parse.com/docs/android_guide
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
